tasks.label: Start Debug Container Script
tasks.command: CONTAINER=$(docker ps --format '{{.Names}}' | grep paperless-ngx | head -1) && docker exec -e PNGX_POSTPROCESSOR_DEBUG=true -e DOCUMENT_ID=${input:documentId} $CONTAINER bash -c 'cd /usr/src/paperless-ngx-postprocessor && source venv/bin/activate && python3 post_consume_script.py'

tasks.label: Stop Container Script
tasks.command: CONTAINER=$(docker ps --format '{{.Names}}' | grep paperless-ngx | head -1) && docker exec $CONTAINER pkill -f 'post_consume_script.py' || true
